text:
June 5, 1959
Dr* Marshall McLuhan
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto ID, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall*
Will be in Washington June 17 and 18. Could go to Philadelphia
to see Seldes from there, perhaps. Has he moved yet or is he
still in Hew York?
Already scheduled back June 18, so let me know pronto if he*d
be available, say, June 19, if I could get transportation.
Regards,
Harry J. Skaraia
Executive Director
HJS/dp
